profile.name: Jake Wharton
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Delivering innovative software solutions at Atlassian
profile.summary: Highly motivated and versatile developer with a passion for open-source projects. Proven track record of contributing to multiple programming languages and domains, including Android logging utilities and Kotlin compiler plugins.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Designed and developed scalable software solutions for Atlassian's flagship products.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to drive innovation and improve customer experience.
Mentored junior engineers and contributed to the growth of the company's technical talent pool.

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developed custom software solutions for clients across multiple industries.
Worked on a wide range of projects, including Android logging utilities and Kotlin compiler plugins.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of multiple open-source projects, including Retrofit and MoSHI.
Participated in code reviews and ensured high-quality standards were met.
